original_text:
All your fortresses are like fig trees
    with their first ripe fruit;
when they are shaken,
    the figs fall into the mouth of the eater.
korean_text: 네 모든 산성은 무화과나무의 처음 익은 열매가 흔들기만 하면 먹는 자의 입에 떨어짐과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: All your fortresses are like fig trees

sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 첫 익은 과일을 가진 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: the figs fall into the mouth of the eater
